name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Danny KRONJAK Appellant
docket_number: Appeal No. 65 Middle District Appeal Docket 1993

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.

MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1801, due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Danny KRONJAK Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
The appeal is hereby dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
MONTEMURO, J., is sitting by designation as Senior Justice pursuant to Judicial Assignment Docket No. 94 R1801, due to the unavailability of LARSEN, J., see No. 127 Judicial Administration Docket No. 1, filed October 28, 1993.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: John Elder, Reading, for D. Kronjak.
Mark C. Baldwin, J. Patrick Hickey, Curtis E. Barnes, Iva C. Dougherty, Reading, for Com.
casebody.head_matter:
644 A.2d 1185
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Danny KRONJAK Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 7, 1994.
Decided July 13, 1994.
John Elder, Reading, for D. Kronjak.
Mark C. Baldwin, J. Patrick Hickey, Curtis E. Barnes, Iva C. Dougherty, Reading, for Com.
Before NIX, C.J., and FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY, CASTILLE and MONTEMURO, JJ.
